header.name: Arthur Brongniart
header.bio: I like where the web is going, I wish to be part of the incoming changes.

xp.title: Torrent media player inside the browser
xp.subject: I work on the front of the app.

xp.title: 3d Home design app
xp.subject: I did several math / webGL related features.
xp.info: Really cool project, I was let free to implement awesome stuffs.

xp.title: Online UML diagram editor
xp.subject: An academic project, my team and I conduct a project for an external company.
xp.info: The web app is based on AngularJs, uses websokect to ensure the collaboration between users.

xp.title: Project management web app
xp.subject: As a trainee
xp.info: I Implemented new features, optimized JS performances, put a lot of efforts on ergonomic aspects.

xp.title: Html5 Turing engine game
xp.subject: As employe of my school Junior Company, I developed a game which exposes the research of the team on the 2D Turing Engine.
xp.info: Lots of interactivity, performance was a critical issue.

xp.title: Historical map editor web app
xp.subject: An academic project, we made an ambitious prototype of a map editor.
xp.info: Store the map's atomic components in a mongoDB, arrange them into a map and style them with a css - like language. The app is based on backbone and uses Leaflet.

xp.title: Interactive stories editor
xp.subject: As a trainee, I improved the editor of the html5 based stories.
xp.info: I proposed and added new features, prototyped a game engine.

s.title: 3D
